description:
A box weapon resembling a giant panther leaps out of Kangaroo`s pouch. It is Uri, who has grown up because of Sun powers! Gamma`s box weapon, Black Fox (Nero Volpi), makes its flames even bigger and intimidates Gokudera. It still seems like it`s saving a lot of its energy. The grown up Uri blocks the injured Gokudera and charges at the black fox. Upon seeing this, Gokudera realizes that Uri is a part of SISTEMA C.A.I. With his Vongola determination, Gokudera begins his surging retaliation--!
Source: crunchyroll
